output.dependency: The hospital name column might determine the city and state location of the hospitals.
The hospital identification number has a format that links to the hospital name in the corresponding column based on shared records.
The 'measure type' column indicates a specific metric related to heart attack or surgical infection prevention, and the 'measure identifier' column corresponds to this metric as a unique identifier.
The detailed description of the measure likely corresponds to the specific measure type identified by the 'measure identifier' column.
